startUrls.title: Expedia or Hotels.com URLs
startUrls.description: URLs of hotels to scrape reviews from. If you add any userData, it will be included in each review for given hotel under the key `customData`

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of reviews to scrape in total. If you keep it empty, there will be no limit

maxReviewsPerHotel.title: Maximum reviews per hotel
maxReviewsPerHotel.description: Maximum number of reviews to scrape per hotel. If you keep it empty, there will be no limit

maxRequestRetries.title: Maximum request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries when a request fails

sortBy.title: Sort by (see note)
sortBy.description: Note: this will not affect the order of reviews in the dataset, since review items are scraped in parallel, so later pages might finish before previous ones. However, it helps in the case you are limiting maximum number of reviews per hotel.

minDate.title: Only reviews after [YYYY-MM-DD]
minDate.description: Scrape only reviews after this date. Use format YEAR-MONTH-DAY, e.g. 2019-01-25. Ignored when using any other sorting than Most recent
